name: Spot The Differences: Art
description:
Find the 5 differences in each image!
Many levels with good quality pictures of paintings and artworks of art.
1) Dalhí, Picasso, Van Gogh, Banksy, Andy Warhol, El Bosco, Miro, ... and many artworks and paintings and paintings!
2) Are you able to find the differences in these good quality art images?
3) The difficulty level of finding differences increases as you level up.
4) You can take cues or help to discover a difference in the images.
5) Designed for mobile and tablets, high quality images!
6) Similar to the classic game "Find the difference", "recognize the differences", "find the differences", "Difference game"
7) Completely free!

Recommended for people who like challenges; The 5 differences can be on any side of the images, anywhere in the pictures ...

In the game of finding differences you should look for the differences between the two photos, trying not to go wrong more than 4 times. If you fail 4 times, you must restart the level.

Many pictures of different paintings good quality art!

Increased difficulty as you progress. You should compare the images in detail to recognize the differences.

Solutions available in case you do not get the 5 differences of a level.
Use the help or the clue to unravel one of the differences.

Recommended to play on mobile and tablet.
